Post-Match Reflections: Blazers' head coach Chauncey Billups called out the team for a lack of effort and described the loss as 'f--- embarrassing.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis Grizzlies punked the Blazers on their home floor despite being injury-ravaged.
Seven Memphis players reached double-figures in scoring.
Blazers shot 34% from the field and a shocking 9.5% (4-42) on 3s.
Blazers turned the ball over 23 times.
Anfernee Simons, Shaedon Sharpe, and Scoot Henderson combined for just 16 points on 7-26 shooting.
Jerami Grant led Portland with 20 points on 7-15 shooting.
Billups took accountability for the team's performance and said he needs to be better.
